name: OR_LNLG_COUNTS_RFSCANRSLT
description: This table contains the results of the radio-frequency scan taken during a count.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the line record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: COUNT_RF_ID_SCAN_RSLT_C_NAME
columns.description: The results of the radio-frequency scan.
